text: Won anɨb ak Jisas agak, Bapi, nad Bɨawl man nad alaŋ sek lum awl sek kod mɨdeban ak, gos nad ak ke nɨge tep gup adek ak gɨpan agak. Binɨb chɨn binɨb awl gos tɨpagɨl nopun apal okok kɨlop nɨŋɨd, gos tep nad ak dɨ we gɨpan agak. Binɨb chɨn gos tep ma mɨdobun, ñapay sɨkol tek mɨdobun apal okok kɨlop dɨl, gos tep ñɨban ak, nep tep agebin agak.
